Text: Example On 15 April 2019 Jeff sold 2000 shares in A plc from his holding of 4000 shares which he had acquired as follows: 1000 in January 1990 1500 in March 2001 1500 in July 2005 Due to significant stock market changes, he decided to purchase 500 shares on 30 April 2019 in the same company.
